comments.tokens: List of whitelisted quote tokens. Only pairs with these quote tokens will be analyzed.

settings.min_liquidity_usd: Minimum liquidity in USD. Higher values mean more stable trading.
settings.max_price_impact: Maximum allowed price impact percentage. Lower values mean more stable price action.
settings.min_daily_volume: Minimum 24h trading volume in USD. Higher values mean more active trading.
settings.min_price_change: Minimum 24h price change percentage. Higher values find more volatile/trending pairs.

comments.note: These settings can be overridden by environment variables in .env file
